website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable boot that keeps your feet warm, but it isn't meant for extreme temperatures.
pros: A stylish option for moderately cold weather

customer_reviews.title: Wow!! Exactly what I was looking for..
customer_reviews.text: Wow !! These boots are exactly what I was looking for. I wear 8.5 / 9, and ordered a 9. They fit perfect with a little wiggle room for thick socks. Very comfortable.. fluffy fur throughout! VERY CUTE with leggings or snow pants and great traction. Also very warm in temps below zero. Shipping wasn't that great:/. Took them two weeks just to ship because they were a specialty item. Oh'well, worth the wait!!!! Love them.. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Mamabb18Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots to take with me to Iceland. They were exactly what I needed. My feet stayed dry when hiking in the rain and through small streams. I never had cold feet the whole time. I ended up wearing these boots everyday! The only negative is their weight. A little heavy to wear everyday and added a good bit of weight to my baggage.
customer_reviews.author: April Buffington

customer_reviews.title: Wore for 5 days then laces snapped.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these boots and the fact they kept my feet warm while visiting Colorado. However, after just 5 days wearing them, the laces snapped on the right boot (they're elastic laces) and now I'm outta luck for the rest of my trip. It stinks because they seem like nice boots, but just aren't holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: emmy

customer_reviews.title: Kamik Women's Snow Boot Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually a size 8 womens. I heard it's best to get a bigger size so I bought a 8.5. It was perfect for all day walking, very lightweight, warm and waterproof. Used it in the snow during our last snow trip, sometimes snow was knee deep and snow did not get inside boot. I also bought the same Kamik brand for my 2 year old. Easy to pull boot on/off and love that the laces are just bungee with no ties.
customer_reviews.author: titamas

customer_reviews.title: Great snow boot and great looking too
customer_reviews.text: A Christmas present for my daughter, and she absolutely loves them. They fit perfectly, they feel great, and they look awesome! She wears a 7 1/2 shoe, and I ordered a 7 1/2 thinking they would probably be too small, but they fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 10 shoe regularly and was worried when I ordered these that I should have gone a size larger, but these fit perfectly. They are so soft inside and wam. Wore them the day I go them outside in 6 inches of snow at 14 F for 2 hours with just regular socks on and my feet never even started to get cold. The tread of the bottom gives excellent grip and they are also very stylish. lots of compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: amazonamy

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: I would've liked to give a 3.5, yes they are true to size with some spare room and very comfy I admit. They are also really waterproof and I bought these in 2015 and still are fine (Jan.2018 now). The downsize was the reason I actually got them was to keep my feet/toes warm. Up to 30mins in cold is when they usually start to feel really cold and have to wiggle and start getting really uncomfortable after a while. Yes I tighten the top and double my already thick socks. Guess the cold air seeps inside from the rubber. That's my only big downfall with them sadly specially if work outside and stand for hours in cold. -Janelle
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for I guess (boots not new out of box)
customer_reviews.text: Imagine my surprise to find a used toe warmer stuck to the inside of the right boot!! I should've been suspicious when I opened the box and saw no labels, no tags, no paper inserts... actually that's how I found the toe warmer, I stuck my hand in expecting to pull out a wad of paper stuffing like you expect to find with new shoes... As for the boots themselves, they appear fine, haven't tried them yet as the temps are just starting to lower...
customer_reviews.author: C. B. Kent

customer_reviews.title: Very warm inside
customer_reviews.text: Boots have beem working great. I purchased over 2 years ago and they still look like brand new. The inside of the are lined which adds extra warmth. The boots are waterproof and still stylish with the look of other expensive brands "hunting boots". I have purchased these shoes as gifts through the years. My reviews are always meant to be helpful opinions based on my thoughts of this product. I look towards others reviews for useful insight into items and I hope mine do the same. Feel free to click the "helpful" button so I know if my review was beneficial. If you have questions about my product review please feel free to reach out. Happy Shopping!
customer_reviews.author: Angelique D

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my feet warm...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots for the snow. Traction, is good. Keeps my feet warm and the boot is light enough. Easy to put on and take off. But after only 2 months of wearing them (not all the time mind you because it hasn't really snowed that much in NYC) the eyelet that hold the rubber lace has snapped off. I will get in contact with the company to let them know their boots need better eyelets. Update: I have since contacted the company and because I've had them for such a short period of time they sent me a new pair of boots! Talk about great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: A. Malek

customer_reviews.title: Quality and comfort for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fit is right on. Roomy enough for a pair of thick socks. Comfort is good, warmth is good. They're easy on and easy off with the elastic pull cord style laces. I specifically wanted a pair that wouldn't require lacing up. My only complaint and this is just personal preference... The fur trim seems so much bigger in person. The picture looks good, but I feel like it's overkill on my foot. I'd probably prefer a bit with less or no fur trim, however I was struggling to find a feminine looking boot that fit all my criteria. Overall these are decent, quality, well priced boots...
customer_reviews.author: Ticky85

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. They are so comfortable and cute. The first pair that I received had a hard stitch sticking out at the tip of my toe that I could tell would be uncomfortable after wearing for a while. I exchanged them and the new pair they sent me are perfect! They are very warm, comfortable and light weight, and they look exactly like the picture. I haven't worn them in the snow yet, but I can tell they are going to be perfect for this upcoming Boston winter! I am so excited to wear them!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Warm but massively bulky.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, these boots are warm. That's the only thing they have going for them. They are bulky, clunky, and not in the least bit feminine. The elastic tie mechanism in the front doesn't effectively cinch closed, so these boots don't really secure to your foot, resulting in the boots (which are heavy at baseline) slipping off the heel with every step. There's no loop/tag at the back to grip on when pulling these boots on. The liner on the bottom has come loose so it wrinkles under my sole. I wish I'd spent a few more dollars and just got a pair of Sorels.
customer_reviews.author: Single Mom of teens

customer_reviews.title: Eyelets ripped
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair, the 3rd time wearing the first pair...the "eyelets" holding the laces broke. I exchanged them for new pair b/c they were so warm & I really wanted them to work! The 3rd time wearing the new pair, the "eyelet" wripped/tore again! I'm so bummed. Happened 3days outside return window(we haven't had much snow this winter)! Ugh. Very frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia S

customer_reviews.title: ... are the cutest boots and I really wanted to like wearing them but the heel inside the boot is ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the cutest boots and I really wanted to like wearing them but the heel inside the boot is too wide and even with a couple of pair of socks, the heel of my foot kept sliding and riding up. I do not have unusually narrow feet, my feet are pretty normal size 7 but I could not imagine walking any distance in these boots, my heels would be rubbed raw. The bottom tread is nice and looks like it would grip well on snow or ice Too bad they didn't work for me. I had to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Jolan

customer_reviews.title: My favorite boots
customer_reviews.text: They boots are great! I live in Western New York, so it gets pretty cold here, and these boots keep my feet dry and warm. They are comfortable and the best part is they are easy to get on and off. When you are in all of your snow gear, covered in snow, the last thing you want to do is try and mess with getting your boots off. I have zero problems with these boots. Great boot!
customer_reviews.author: MJackson

customer_reviews.title: They're actually waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for walking my dog, twice a day through snow/sleet/slush along roads and in fields. I've had bad luck the past couple of years finding some that actually remain waterproof for an entire season of heavy use. These made the cut! After wearing them for 3-4 miles of walking daily from Nov to Mar, they're still waterproof, still comfortable, still warm and still even manage to look good! I'm impressed! I think these can last another season, though may buy a second pair just to stock up. I definitely recommend them over Columbia. :)
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Really great snow boots
customer_reviews.text: Being from the northeast I have to deal with cold and snow for many of the winter months. These boots are very warm and keep my feet dry. There was no break in period and I have recommended them to a couple friends who also love them. The black goes with everything and I like that they are adjustable with the drawstring at the top. The fur on mine was a tad more bulky than what I was expecting but I don’t mind since they keep my feet dry and toasty. Can’t beat the price either!
customer_reviews.author: cs

customer_reviews.title: ... don't think I can adequately state how much I love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I don't think I can adequately state how much I love these boots! They are gorgeous! And feel like I am putting on a tall pair of slippers they are so comfortable. I purchased the Charcoal color and it is such a pretty color with a soft design. I normally wear an 8.5 in shoes but purchased a size 9 so I could wear thicker socks and find the sizing on this to be as expected. These boots literally hug your feet and legs in warmth and comfort. You can easily walk around without them slipping about your heels and I would highly recommend me these! So happy with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Buckleymomma

customer_reviews.title: Lacing loops ripped through in less than a week!
customer_reviews.text: These seem to run slightly small. (Decided to keep my normal size although I felt like I could go up a 1/2 size) They are very comfortable though. BUT I have had these a week, worn then less than 5 times and the ribbon loops for the laces are ripped through on both boots. Buy the ones with the metal rings, or regular lacing holes
customer_reviews.author: Dianne E. Gaddis

customer_reviews.title: Great boots for the snow.
customer_reviews.text: I wore these boots in 10-30 degree F weather in the snow/ice. My feet were never cold. The tread on the bottom is pretty good, still be carful on ice. The boot is designed so that it does not allow snow in at all. I have wider feet, and some boots cause pain at the toe box. These were very comfortable. The inside is fake fur, and very cushioned and warm. -this review is my own, I did not receive any compensation or discount for writing it.
customer_reviews.author: Pleased650

customer_reviews.title: Super warm and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I had gone to Farm and Fleet to get a pair of these for myself as a Christmas gift from my mother. They didn't have my size which was kind of a bummer. But I was pleasantly surprised to notice that Amazon had them and I was able to get them in my size. These fit excellent and I absolutely love them. Granted we haven't had a lot of snow this year and I've only worn them to her three times but when I have they've been completely comfortable and most importantly super warm!
customer_reviews.author: Snowflake

customer_reviews.title: Love slipping these on! Comfortable & Functional!
customer_reviews.text: I just got back from a ski trip where I was congratulating myself on this boots purchase every day. Pros: comfortable, great traction, warm, waterproof, easy to get on and off . . . just plain WONDERFUL! I am between a 7.5 and an 8 -- usually an 8 for athletic shoes -- and the 8 fit well when worn with Smartwool PhD ski socks. They are a tad bit big with the thin boot socks that I wear with my dressy boots. Definitely still wearable, but slip a bit.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMom

customer_reviews.title: Cold toes
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these boots up until I was shin high in snow and the temperature was 0 and my toes were super cold even though I had two pair of warm socks and I wasn’t outside that long, 30 minutes tops. I’m very disappointed I though they were for -20 but if my feet are cold at 0 I don’t see how these would keep my poor toes warm in colder weather. I had high hopes for these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Very warm and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. Very warm and comfy. I have to stand outside at a bus stop and these boots keep my feet very warm and dry. If you plan on wearing thick heavy socks you may want to go a half size up. But they are warm enough to wear with regular socks They are easy to slip on. High enough to keep out snow. Very nice boots
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Great design - not so great build
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could love these more. They are so cute, but there is something weird with the top of the boot in the toe area. Probably where the tongue is sewn in. There is something hard that presses down on the top of the foot and hurts. I only notice it in one of the boots, the other seems fine. They are very warm and absolutely darling. Love the design... just not the best build. I'm going to keep them and wear heavy socks... I HATE the hassle of returning things. :)
customer_reviews.author: Angie L

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Boots
customer_reviews.text: OHHHHHH my goodness!!!!! These boots arrived JUST in time for the freezing temps we are experiencing in Kentucky. I have NEVER had such warm comfortable feet in the cold as I do now! I have terrible circulation in my hands and feet. Once I took the boots off, I put my hands inside them to warm them up. I highly recommend these boots. Now to find gloves that will keep me warm lol
customer_reviews.author: Kate Cook

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but Order Up a Size
customer_reviews.text: Based on what other reviewers were saying, I did not order up a size. I ordered my daughter's normal size, an 8. They were too tight with thin socks. We are exchanging them for a 9. They seem comfortable, other than running small. If you plan to wear these with thick socks, order up a full size. You may wish to order up 1/2 a size even for thin socks. I will update my review after we get the larger ones, and after we see how they fair in the snow, in really cold weather, and with respect to durability.
customer_reviews.author: OC Girl

customer_reviews.title: Not for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: They didn't advertise as wide, and boy does that make a difference. Based on the other reviewers I ordered my regular shoe size, but it was too narrow in the toes. I tried a half size up, but then my ankle kept slipping out when I walked and it still felt a bit tight (though less so). This would have been a nice boot, but after two tries, I was over it.
customer_reviews.author: KiraStar

customer_reviews.title: Really good snow boots.
customer_reviews.text: Great cold weather boots, especially if you encounter slush. The water proof design is handy in the city. I wear regular weight crew socks with these boots. . The fit is true to size but loose in the toes. They keep my feet warm. The boots are not light weight, but I can walk in them comfortably for quite a distance. My only caveat is that they are hard to pull on and take off as they have no zipper - apparently a trade off to insure no water gets in. They are a real bargain .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, ok for wide feet, big calves
customer_reviews.text: Very warm, but these run small. I wear a 7 but ordered a 7.5 for thick sock space and they are a bit tight with thin socks on. Also quite snug in the calf. I have big calves, and could squeeze into these, but it was definitely a squeeze. They feel snug in the calves, but the material is flexible so it’s not uncomfortable. I also have a wide foot, and these mostly accommodate my feet without squashing them. They just feel super snug. I’m returning them, but ordering a full size up, which should do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: K. schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Nice snow boots
customer_reviews.text: If someone is looking good quality snow boots, this is the one. The boots is very warm and fuzzy. It is water resistant too. It looks so good. Must buy for snow.
customer_reviews.author: Gunjan

customer_reviews.title: Could use some improvements...
customer_reviews.text: These boots are super cute and pretty lightweight, but not made for a North Idaho winter. They're fine for the majority of our weather here but aren't the best option when it's below zero. I loved the elastic laces but the loops that hold the lace wore out pretty quickly. I only wore them for about 2 months before those wore out. So far no issues with the durability of the rest of the boot. They did seem to be pretty waterproof so if they were to reinforce the pieces that hold the laces I'd be willing to recommend them for climates that aren't so cold.
customer_reviews.author: L. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Snow boots!! Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These boots are amazing! I absolutely love them. When I opened the box, it was love at first sight. They fit perfectly and if wear no socks,thin socks,or even thick socks they still fit perfectly. The quality and look of them are well made. I love that they are waterproof and go up the calf. I am 5'4". I doubt anyone could be disappointed in this product. And right on time for the last snow storm.
customer_reviews.author: Tabzster

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo warm and durable!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are so warm and durable. I live in a city where the winters get very cold and very snowy. I've worn these boots for an entire winter season now and I can confidently say that they will withstand just about anything. My feet are always warm and dry. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Lanette

customer_reviews.title: The PERFECT winter boot!
customer_reviews.text: They just arrived. They are a great fit! I am so relieved bc I have been having trouble with sizing lately. Other winter boots I have tried are just a bit too narrow ( i have a B width) or my heel slips up and down. No zippers, or tying up of laces either. Slip your foot in and tighten the toggle or not. I haven't been outside in the cold yet. But they are made with 200 g, 3M Thinsulate insulation. According to the tag these boots can handle up to -40C and -40F.
customer_reviews.author: D. Burtman

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: These may be the best winter boots I've ever owned. They are extremely comfortable, warm, waterproof and cute! I feel adorable wearing them. They are extremely comfy especially in extreme cold. They're actually too warm for non-freezing weather and will make my calves sweat! I removed the footbeds from the boots and replaced them with my own arch supports. So not only are they comfortable bit I also don't have to worry about my feet or back being destroyed. I also bought a pair of Kamik rain boots this year and they are awesome as well, so I'm thinking Kamik is now my go-to brand for semi-affordable footwear!
customer_reviews.author: Medium-Short Person

customer_reviews.title: Warm, Comfortable, Waterproof, Light Weight
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great very comfortable compared to other snow boots I usually wear an 8, but I bought a 9 so I could fit my big fluffy socks inside if your not wearing big fluffy socks and 8 would have been fine. They keep my feet warm and dry been in the snow with them down to 20° and stayes warm. I use then as rain boots too since my feet stay so warm. They are light weight so you won't feel like you dragging lead feet. flexible sole keeps the snow from packing into the groves and no slipping and falling either.
customer_reviews.author: Christin Newell

customer_reviews.title: Run Big
customer_reviews.text: These seem like nice boots! I ordered an 8 as that’s what I usually wear in boots and they were way too big. I have very narrow feet and found it hard to tighten them enough so my feet didn’t slip around. Also, there was a piece that dug into the back of my foot where the material changed. Would have loved to exchange for a smaller size, however the size I likely needed was $15 more so I’m returning and looking for different boots altogether. As I only wore them inside for a few mins, I can’t speak to how well they keep your feet dry/warm. I had high hopes for these!
customer_reviews.author: MalPal

customer_reviews.title: I ordered these and I really liked the quality and the look
customer_reviews.text: Okay... I ordered these and I really liked the quality and the look. They were really warm for the few minutes I wore them around my house. Unfortunately, they were a little narrow for my feet and ankles and because of that they took a lot of effort to get on. I ordered another pair of boots that are roomier and fit well, so I will be returning these. Since I did really like this boot, I left a 5 stars, it's not their fault that I have fat feet!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer9040019

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these boots half a size larger than I usually where, and they fit great. They where a little snug the first week, but now they aren't. I also have wide claves, and these still fit very well. The temperature has been 15 to -20 degrees the last several weeks, snowing for days at a time. My feet have never been wet, nor cold. I haven't spent more than a hour outside at a time, and I'm either shoveling snow or playing in it. In March I'll have the opportunity to spend hours outside in them, while watching the Iditarod. They also still look great, now visible wear. Money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: ashleybeth7502

customer_reviews.title: GREAT WINTER BOOTS!!!
customer_reviews.text: These boots keep my feet warm & DRY!!! They come up high enough for snow fun AND outdoor work. They are super cute on. They are comfortable. Did I mention WARM!!! I would buy these for all my friends if I could. There is a harden part along the back calf that tends to annoy me thus the 4 stars. I think possibly because they are brand new. I will review further once this winter season comes to an end.
customer_reviews.author: Real MomMe

customer_reviews.title: Love these Boots!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a half size larger since they were a better price and in case I wore thick socks. No need for thick socks with these! I'm a teacher and go outside for recess duty and we go outside if it's above 0. We have had some cold days but my feet stay warm! I love that they go high on my calf to keep more of my leg warm. I love the look of the fur and they look great when I have skinny jeans/leggings on but it doesn't work well with snowpants. I have gotten lots of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: RachelT

customer_reviews.title: so I ordered that size after reading the reviews and they fit great! I wear them with one pair of handmade ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 8 US, 39 EUR, so I ordered that size after reading the reviews and they fit great! I wear them with one pair of handmade wool socks - they would be tight with thicker socks but they're really warm as is. This winter (so far) has been very cold as Oregon winters go, and these boots have kept my feet warm and dry in sub freezing temperatures. And...they look great while doing it. I couldn't be more pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots!! So far they are completely water proof and they do a great job of keeping your feet warm in the snow. The treads are incredibly deep. The boots pull on and off very easily and I get lots of compliments on them. Best of all they are very comfortable for walking, they're not too heavy and they fit snugly so they don't slip and slide on your feet like some snow boots are prone to do.
customer_reviews.author: KAN

customer_reviews.title: Cute, warm, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Cute boots but also functional being very warm and also comfortable. Walked about 4 miles in them to and from a football game with no discomfort. Fit true to size. No issues with socks slipping down. Go great with white coat.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: My first desire with a new pair of winter boots was stability on slippery surfaces. These work, unless it's black ice and what works on that? The boots are attractive, but the fur that extends to the toe doesn't seem to keep my toes warm in our single digit temps, even with silk liner socks and wool socks on. I'm not out for more than 2 hours so I can bear it. I like the easy pull elastic lace system.
customer_reviews.author: p.eagle

customer_reviews.title: Wam and Comfortable Boots
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these boots in Color "Navy", Size 7 (intentionally ordered 1/2 size larger than I normally wear as I wear thicker socks in the winter). The Kamik Boots are extremely comfortable. Got to try them in snow and cold weather within 2-days of receiving. They kept my feet dry in our fresh snow and 19 degree weather, and I love the Navy color and Deep Purple fabric at the tongue area. I will definitely order these again.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Diane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Boot
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great!! They are very warm, lightweight and attractive. The fur is thick and lush and the gray fabric is a nice tone. I'd say they are true to size based on other boots I have ordered. (I always add arch supports to my shoes for my own foot issues, so I order up to make room.) You can't go wrong with this boot. Very cute boot with no floppy shoe strings to come untied drag in the snow and deal with; warm and comfortable. I get lots of compliments on these. You can't go wrong!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sally300

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our vacation in Yellowstone National Park this Feb. 2020. I really wanted something warm and waterproof. These boots were perfect! I did end up ordering a half size bigger after returning my first pair. I wanted to make sure I could wiggle my toes a little with 2 pairs of socks. Glad I did as the bigger size fit perfectly. I wore these all day in snow and cold. Completely dry and comfortable. The first day at Yellowstone was -20 degrees. My toes got a little cold, but not too bad. I was very pleased with the boots, and now they are my go to for all outdoor activities.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, but you can find them cheaper elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: The boots are holding up well in a Michigan winter. I've worn them in snow, ice, ice with salt, rain, rain puddles. They keep my feet warm and dry. I wear a 9 / 9.5 shoe and these 9.5 boots fit snug with thin socks. They are tight with my boot socks. So I wear my thin socks with them and my feet still stay warm. Only thing is you can find these for $20.00 cheaper at Sears.
customer_reviews.author: toofew

customer_reviews.title: Won't tighten!
customer_reviews.text: These seemed great, but wouldn't tighten since they had an elastic cord as a shoe lace. I ordered both this pair and the Columbia Women's Ice Maiden II boot. The Columbia boot far surpassed the practicality of these Kamiks. The regular laces allow you to tighten the boot and they're very comfortable and easy to get on!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy LP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great boots. I have no complaints at all. The sizing was completely accurate if you know your feet. I normally wear an 8 1/2 -9 in women's US and ordered these in a 9. They fit perfectly and they are really comfortable. They kept my feet warm and cozy in frigid MN temperatures and they kept all moisture out of the inside. My favorite part are the laces. I didn't even notice them when I bought them but I was pretty ecstatic when I realized I didn't have to tie them. In addition, there is no loose tongue to get shoved down when you put them on. Really great comfortable boots.
customer_reviews.author: Bee Si

customer_reviews.title: Best boots I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I've owned these boots for a year and a half now and they are just as great as the day I bought them. I have never owned a pair of boots that kept my feet so warm, even in zero degree weather. The are very well made and durable and definitely waterproof. They are bulky and can be cumbersome when walking long distances , but they are not heavy and I wear them to grocery shop, etc. without any problem. I will definitely buy Kamik brand again.
customer_reviews.author: TDG

customer_reviews.title: ... a pair of these for my daughter and she loved them. Ordered one for myself
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair of these for my daughter and she loved them. Ordered one for myself. I normally wear a 10 and ordered an 11 because I want to wear thick socks with them. Can wear with thick or thin socks. They are warm and comfortable. Comfort is something hard to find in winter boot and you don't have to tie them. Easy on and easy off.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle H.

customer_reviews.title: warmest boots ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have Reynards syndrome which effects the circulation to my hands and feet. I walk my Lab every day for an hour in the early, early morning, in every kind of weather and I needed a warm water/snow proof boot. Well, Kamik Momentum Snow Boot came through! It was -20 below here in New Jersey this past week and these boots proved their worth! They kept my feet from freezing and turning white, and I only had on normal socks! No thermal socks needed. Can't say enough about these boots! Now if I can only find a pair of insulated gloves that are pliable that can do the same for my hands!
customer_reviews.author: Gwenn K.

customer_reviews.title: Inside lining is falling apart!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots two months ago and they are already falling apart. The inside lining has started to tear, and everytime I take my boots off the entire lining slips out and I have to push it back in and readjust it. Because this keeps happening, the inside sole feels all bunched up and is very uncomfortable. I got a slip on boot so that I could slip it on and off with ease, and not everytime I put them back on it's a hassle to get the lining back in place again.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Byers

customer_reviews.title: Practical, comfortable, affordable.
customer_reviews.text: I have to wear wide width shoes so I was pleasantly surprised when these boots fit me well and comfortably. They are water resistant/waterproof. As icing on the cake, they are very cute. Most winter boots that are similar are at least double the cost. I do wear a size 9 but normally have to do a 9 1/2 or even 10 for extra width. These boots are a size 9 and fit me just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S.

customer_reviews.title: The BEST!
customer_reviews.text: I was so sad when the winter boots I had for 7 years finally bit the dust. I did my research and found these boots highly rated. I was skeptical because I didn't think anything could beat my previous boots, but I was wrong! These boots actually keep my toes warms (which seems impossible) and are so comfortable. I mainly use them for hiking in the woods with my dog in the snow, and they are perfect. I would HIGHLY recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jade Pfund

customer_reviews.title: Awesome in everyway- functional and stylish...
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Great for Michigan weather. True to size and perfect fit. Wish more shoe companies offered 10 1/2 since that is my true size, bit rare to find. These keep my feet warm, have great tread on the sole, and room for thick socks without being too tight, but even wore them without socks to take the trash out and they weren't too big. Cute, comfortable, warm, and easy to slip on, everything I was looking for. Wish I could get another pair without the fur on top.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, stylish, comfortable.  Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a lot of boots and bought these for Vermont winter weather. I wanted something warm, waterproof and comfortable. Just received them, wore them for 1/2 day inside and think they will work great. I am a size 7, ordered a 7 1/2 and they fit just right. Comfortable barefoot or with a wool ski sock. Easy to pull on and off as you don’t have to tie laces. They are flexible and not too clunky. I ordered the plum, the color is very nice and what I expected, and overall stylish with nice fur. I hope they will be warm and dry, all else is great.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Good under certain conditions
customer_reviews.text: I like the boots a lot but my toes still get cold. Definitely better than the other pair I had before this so it could be worse but I would say that the really expensive boots are worth it if they keep my feet warmer than this. The color was beautiful and as expected. I would recommend these, just not if you are going to be out in the cold for a long time. They are also NOT rain boots by any means. They are decently waterproof if you get snow on them but if you step in a deep puddle, the water will come in and your feet are going to get wet.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Vargo

customer_reviews.title: Kept my feet warm and didn’t slip or slide.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased before vacation to Breckenridge, CO in January. Spent several hours outdoors every day during which time, it snowed another 24 inches. I’m in my late 60’s and had hip replacement so really wanted a boot that made me feel secure when walking. My feet stayed warm and even when I‘d hit a patch of ice while walking, they gripped & I didn’t fall! Of course, I was cautious but able to keep up with my adult children. I also received several compliments from some of the locals.
customer_reviews.author: Texas customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny! My favorite boots
customer_reviews.text: OMG! I love these boots. These are the best boots ever and I own at least 10 pairs of boots including BOGS and Sorel. They are rate to -40C which is good to know since it gets darn cold up here in Canada. I love that there are no laces to tie. I purchased these a half size larger than my regular shoe size as I like wearing thicker socks in the winter. Don't hesitate. These boots are the bomb and super comfortable. I do about 10,000 steps in these every day because I'm a dog walker. Excellent threads for snow and ice. You won't regret this purchase. It's worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Butterbug's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good boot
customer_reviews.text: They fit nice and are comfortable. I could have gotten an 8. That is my normal size but I went up a half just in case but they still work great. They have kept my feet warm. The boot is thick around the sides and top. It is fine for wearing with snow pants over it, however I wish it was a little less bulky around the ankle/calf area if I just wanted to wear out with pants.
customer_reviews.author: Dawes

customer_reviews.title: Warmest boots!
customer_reviews.text: If you want warm and waterproof in shallow city puddles (3in deep or less), get these boots! It was -12 yesterday in Chicago and I could still feel my toes while walking to work. They were probably the only thing I could still feel when I walked in to the office. These boots are great! I wear socks even with the fur lining. I normally buy an 8-8.5 shoe depending on the brand, bought an 8 and they fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley

customer_reviews.title: Feet stay dry and toasty! Easy on/off and comfy.
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear an 8.5 I ordered that size and they fit perfectly. In some brands I need a wide but these seems to run slightly wider than average. These boots keep my feet dry and warm. They are great with leggings, but do not work well with pants you can't tuck in (like jeans). They go on and off very easily, but don't fall off. I personally would prefer fleece instead of faux fur at the top, but that's just a preference.
customer_reviews.author: Katcoley

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, not stiff!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are so warm, with great ease and flexion while walking. Not stiff at the ankles, lots of flexibility in tightness for calf. I was very comfortable and always completely dry! Good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots, 8.0 a little big for 7.5
customer_reviews.text: I like these boots a lot. Simple style, definitely warm. I'm usually a 7.5. I got an 8 because I don't like having pinched feet and figured I might want to add thick socks. While they are comfortable and walkable, they are clearly too big for me with regular socks, but based on my other experiences trying on (many, so many) snow boots, the 7 would almost surely have been too small. If you are a between size it might be worth trying to find a brand that does half sizes.
customer_reviews.author: KSG

customer_reviews.title: Super warm & lightweight
customer_reviews.text: The most thing I love is how light these incredibly warm boots are! I feel like I could walk or snowshoe for ever in these! And true to the awesome advice by previous purchasers of these boots; is that ordering a regular size up (1 larger) works perfect! It allows room for a thick ski or winter sock. They look great! Comes to top of the calf comfortably. Just wish they were a tad easier to slip into, but love these boots!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Hiow this boot fits
customer_reviews.text: I have say this boot very well insulated my feet actionally sweats in it. I live upstate Ny an it’s cold up here An my feet are kept warm an dry. I wear size 5 but bought a size 6 due to wanting be able wear think socks if extremely cold. Unfortunately Iam in able to asit has so much material to it there’s no room inside boots wear my feet is its extremely snug fit. Iam glad I bought size up as I would have had to return it back. So all in all it does job, will keep u very warm an dry Denise
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Love these- sorry I won't have more use for them in North Texas :(
customer_reviews.text: If my feet are cold I'm cold. Spent a week in Fraser CO in March in these (70+" of snow this march) and I was warm the whole time- even playing in snow, tubing, and embarrassingly when I fell through the snow up to my hips. The 'fur' lining kept the wet and cold out!
customer_reviews.author: MsHellfire

customer_reviews.title: Great boots for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I have only worn these out in our snowy Michigan weather a couple times so far, but so far I love them! I raved about them to anyone who would listen! Good tread, warm, easy to put on and take off, not too heavy. I will admit, I am not much of the outdoor type, so I have never really had a good pair of boots. So maybe to a winter hiker enthusiast, these would not be good enough. But for some snow shoveling, playing with kids in the snow, these worked great for me!
customer_reviews.author: Momto4boys

customer_reviews.title: Comfy & Warm, Great for all-day wear.
customer_reviews.text: So warm!! Ultra comfortable, worn all day at work the first day after purchase and no blisters or discomfort. I had no idea they were fully lined with faux fur. My feet are always cold, so for a whole day in below freezing temps to feel warm and cozy is jaw-dropping. My friend has a similar pair from another manufacturer, and she thought mine were cuter. (They are) I should have bought these years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and cute
customer_reviews.text: Still have these boots a year later and absolutely love them, durable, bungee laces still intact and tightens and loosens just like the day I bought. Only down side is there not as warm as the description says. Feet still get pretty cold. I just wear a thicker sock or 2 pairs. I'd buy again just for the durability alone.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnette

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Kept my feet warm in -20 weather in Alaska!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these boots to wear for our trip to Alaska for Christmas. These boots did great!!! It was -20 and below for several days when we ventured outside of our hotel. The boots kept my feet nice and toasty!! I wore spandex style socks and was fine. I have larger calves and this made the fur around the top stick out more that I would like but my snow pants covered it so it wasn't a big deal. I usually wear a size 6 1/2 and I ordered a size 7 boot and it fit great!!! I'm very happy with the quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Shea

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, fits well.
customer_reviews.text: I just got these, so I can't speak as to their durability yet, but I can say that they feel amazing. I wear a size 8, so I risked ordering a size 8 and they fit pretty well. There isn't really enough room to wear heavy socks, but they feel so warm on the inside I honestly don't really think I will need super heavy socks. They JUST fit, no extra room, but they do fit. A size up would be way too big. They look very nice too - I can't wait to wear them!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Kipfer

customer_reviews.title: Warm, comfy, wonderful boots
customer_reviews.text: These are the best boots. They kept my feet warm and dry even in slush. NEVER HAD cold feet all season long. I was hesitant at first with the long shoe tongue, thinking snow vould slide in, but it never did even while sledding. They are comfortable too. I walk the dog every chicago snowy xay in these. Definitely exceeded my expectations. Great boots!
customer_reviews.author: Bpw0614

customer_reviews.title: but they are warm and very comfortable. I wore them to an NFL game in ...
customer_reviews.text: Not crazy about the lace tightening mechanism, but they are warm and very comfortable. I wore them to an NFL game in 20-25 degree weather. We stood the whole game and my feet were pretty cold by the end of 4 hours, so I was a little disappointed. However, I doubt there's a product out there for under $100 where your feet won't be cold after standing on concrete for that long. I only had a pair of medium weight wool socks on with the boots. Next time I'll wear thicker wool socks and see how they do!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly R

customer_reviews.title: NOT waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Bought these boots because reviews said they were warm and the description said the boots were waterproof. While shoveling snow today, I found out very quickly they are NOT waterproof. Both of my feet were soaking wet.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: I've owned for about a month and am a happy walker so far
customer_reviews.text: It is what I expected. I'm a letter carrier with the post office which means that I am walking outside for up to 8 hours usually. They keep my feet warm and dry with a little wiggle room for an extra pair of socks with my normal shoe size. Exactly what I was looking for. I will say that at first there is an off putting bump on the toe part but my feet have adjusted to the feel of the boot. I've owned for about a month and am a happy walker so far.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Zwerk

customer_reviews.title: So comfy and warm
customer_reviews.text: I needed boots that I could shovel and play in Buffalo snow in, but also be comfortable running errands in. These boots are super lightweight and comfy, almost slipper-like, and my feet are dry and warm for hours. I have large wide feet (11w) and they fit me nicely. I had ordered a pair of Sorels also and chose these for fit and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn P

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality Boot
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very warm! there is fur lining inside so the fit is a little snug (I wear 7.5, ordered an 8 and it was a comfortable fit) Trying to get them on, just from the thick fur lining. I love the white color, very pretty! I’ll have to update once we get some decent snow.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots!
customer_reviews.text: These are great boots! I did buy a half size bigger to accommodate for thicker socks. They were a tad bit loose with my regular socks, which was to be expected. I went and played in the deep snow for an hour with my regular socks on, and my feet were toasty warm the whole time. And I was pleasantly surprised at how lightweight the boots are! Really glad I purchased these!
customer_reviews.author: WashingtonMama

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: Great for Cleveland weather, order one size down or the same size you would wear for UGG brand. I normally wear a 7 but boots are always made bigger. These keep my feet warm and don't hurt my feet after standing for a long time. They sometimes feel heavy because they are made of rubber however, you will not slide/ fall or freeze in these. The only annoying part is that my socks slide off and I can't figure out why. I have to take the boots off to pull my socks back up and it happens frequently. No annoying shoe laces. They are fashionable too. Waterproof and I think resistant up to -20 degree weather
customer_reviews.author: rach

customer_reviews.title: This boot was designed smaller than it should be.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this boot a half size larger than I normally wear. I tried to get into this boot with all my might. I felt like Cinderella's step sisters. It was marked as a 9, when I finally got my foot into it, it was so tight it felt like an 8. I wear an 8-1/2. It is a nice boot. I am now checking with relatives to see who can fit this boot. So far it's 0-2. I am still seeking family who could wear it. very disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot! I use these boots to shovel snow ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Boot! I use these boots to shovel snow and for after skiing...tramping through snow! They are warm, comfortable and not heavy like some boots are! You can cinch the string up and get a really snug and secure fit around your ankle which I think is important when tramping through snow! They don't feel bulky at all! Would definitely recommend these to a friend and/or buy again! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy  Corrigan

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: I really like these boots! I had to order a full size bigger than I normally wear, the half size up was too short and my toes hit the end of the boot. Now with the bigger boot, I can wear thicker socks. Although I am not looking forward to winter, I am glad to know that I have nice boots to keep my feet warm and the snow out.
customer_reviews.author: peggy

customer_reviews.title: Nice Winter Boots!
customer_reviews.text: I received these for Christmas and am very pleased! They fit as expected, so I would suggest buying whatever size you normally wear. The pull string is great... just slip on, pull the string, and go.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: I just love it, don’t believe all the bad reviews because I traveled to Iceland and I used the boots all the time, hiking, climbing, walk very long distance and I just love it. No slippers when I walk in the Iceland mountains. Really warm I just need one pair of socks.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Nieves

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!... A little narrow though
customer_reviews.text: These are very warm and functional snow boots for the limited time I have worn them, due to a mild winter. (Strange to say that when other places this year were dumped on!) Straight out of the box, they appeared to be a bit narrow along the toes. I had read on other reviews to size up, unfortunately I didn't follow that when I first ordered them and when I went to return and size up (8 to 8.5)- they were already sold out! So I kept them and the few times I have worn them, they seem to have "broken in." Overall, happy with the purchase and would suggest to others. Maybe next year we will have more snow...
customer_reviews.author: sunnysideup

customer_reviews.title: Comfort, dryness, warmth
customer_reviews.text: I wore these new boots in Northern MN recently. Running around outside and in kept my feet warm and dry, but when I was outside for almost 2 hours walking around with them, my toes did get a little cold. But...my feet stayed dry and comfortable. I probably should of gotten a 1/2 size larger so I could layer socks better, but I wore a thick pair and that was fine for the most part. Love the boots!!
customer_reviews.author: Trailgal

customer_reviews.title: I personally love these- recently moved from SC to IN and was ...
customer_reviews.text: I personally love these- recently moved from SC to IN and was NOT aware that I didn't own real shoes... first snow storm came and I was happy to have these! I didn't want the Ugg look everyone seems to love, so these were a nice compromise. Warning that they are slightly clunky, but not uncomfortable. Also fur lined, so perfectly warm without being too much. Would buy again, and fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Bunny Thunder

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE THESE!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE THESE!!! I live in the northwest now and it gets very cold and snowy here. I am incredibly warm when I wear these boots, even with normal socks. Wearing wool socks with these keeps my feet so cozy and warm all day. My feet do not get wet even when the snow goes almost all the way up the boots. I plan on buying these again in a different color in the future because I love them so much. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: These run small!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the boots but I wear a 7 and had to return for an 8 - my one foot was just too tight in the toe area and overall the feeling was just too tight throughout and to wear them with my winter socks would be impossible without ordering up a size. So I did.
customer_reviews.author: Krissa

customer_reviews.title: GREAT shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so I got my original size and they were too small. I returned and got asize BIGGER and they were still pretty tight. I said they were a problem with arch support because there is no support and the insert is flimsy and comes out every time you take your foot out. That being said, I took these snowshoeing all day and I LOVED them. I went into ice rivers with them on and there was absolutely no leaking or cold feet at all. They are like a nice warm soft glove for your feet! They also look cool too, which matters to me.
customer_reviews.author: J.J.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, stylish and true to size.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my girlfriend as well as a pair for my daughter based on her initial reaction. She commented that they are true to size for what a snow boot should be, allowing for a warm pair of socks and are extremely comfortable. She hasn't taken them into serious snowy and wet conditions yet but around the neighborhood they've been great. I'll do a full review after the next trip to the mountain.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Colombo

customer_reviews.title: Super Warm, A Little Snug
customer_reviews.text: These boots are super warm. I ordered my exact size and found them to be a little snug, but honestly it wasn’t because the shoe itself was incorrect, it’s just super lined for warmth! So I really can’t complain. I haven’t been able to use them in major snow yet, but I can say in a cold slushy mess, they did the job.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Sinatra

customer_reviews.title: Order your size and do not size up.
customer_reviews.text: I love the boots and received several compliments on a nice looking boot. The left foot fits but the right foot is too big. I usually wear a size 10 but noticed a comment that they run small so I sized up a 1/2 size but should have ordered the size 10. I would have exchanged but at the time I received them it snowed and I needed them since that is why I purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: joan roberts

customer_reviews.title: Very Please with this Boot
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with these boots. They have so far been warm down to 30 degrees. Have been waterproof through puddles and rain. They also fit very well. I am a 7.5 wide, so I got an 8. I am able to wear one pair of winter socks and have a comfortable fit in the boot. Possibly one of the best buys I have made this year.
customer_reviews.author: A Small Farmer

product_meta.title: Kamik Women's Momentum Snow Boot
product_meta.description:
A subtle print, faux fur lining, and embossed lacing graphics add femininity to this techy snow boot.

Kamik comes from a place of extremes. Where the harshest conditions intersect with some of the most beautiful sights you'll ever see. At Kamik, we make footwear that brings to life our northern origins. Singular. Strong. Simply dependable. We've been doing it for over 100 years. Day after day. 24/7. The result of all this effort: a complete line of outdoor footwear built to deliver superior comfort and reliable protection in the most extreme conditions. We know you wouldn't have it any other way.
feature_bullets: Made in the USA or Imported
Seam-sealed waterproof snow boot featuring plush faux-fur collar, quick bungee lacing, and grippy PEAK snow and ice traction sole
Gusseted tongue to keep snow out
Waterproof nylon upper with a faux fur collar and a waterproof gusset tongue
